TopicTitle: Make Anomalies visible in all Terrain Detail settings

Articles.Content:
Apologies if this is in the wrong place, but...

Can the glitch where some anomalies float above the ground or sink beneath it out if sight be fixed?

It's good that some can be very hard to find, but surely that all at least need to be visible when reasonably close, regardless of graphics settings.
